---
title: Gross Domestic Product
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
# See https://www.r-spatial.org/r/2018/10/25/ggplot2-sf.html

suppressMessages(library(tidyverse))
suppressMessages(library(ggplot2))
library(rnaturalearth)
library(rnaturalearthdata)

world <- ne_countries(scale="medium", returnclass="sf") %>%
   mutate(gdp = log10(gdp_md_est)) %>%
   mutate(country = iso_a3)

big <- world %>% top_n(10, wt=gdp) %>% arrange(desc(gdp))

tab <- data.frame(big) %>% select(country, gdp_md_est)
colnames(tab) <- c("Country", "GDP")
```
```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
library(knitr)
kable(tab, caption="Countries with Top Ten GDPs")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=F}
ggplot(data = world) +
   geom_sf(aes(fill = gdp), show.legend=F) +
   xlab("Longitude") + ylab("Latitude") +
   ggtitle("GDP") +
   scale_fill_viridis_c() 
   # geom_sf_text(data=big, aes(label=country))

```
